item.title: Notice Asking Women Advocates To Stop 'Arranging Hair In Open Court' Causes Uproar
item.description: Notice Asking Women Advocates To Stop ‘Arranging Hair In Open Court’ Causes Uproar It is regularly seen that women advocates are styling their hair in open Court, which is disrupting the running of the Court,"
